CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 7, 1961, pg. A29, reads: "Softball Champions - Smiles were the order of the day at Ammon Field, recently, as members of the Porky's team received the championship trophy for the Ammon Slow Pitch League.  Mrs. E. Williams, team sponsor, is shown receiving the trophy from Manager J. Sumpter.  Batboys Ed Ransom Jr. and Rod Williams are shown on the left.  Other team members are James Hawkins, Ed Ransom, Mel Brown, A. D. Hall, Irv Redmond, Roderick Barron, Calvin Allen, Edward Johnson, Charles Sterling, George Hall, Jake Stewart and Louis Hines.  Calvin Fowler, star cager at St. Francis College, is missing from the photo. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Porky's softball team sponsor E. Williams receiving Ammon Slow Pitch League championship trophy from J. Sumpter, surrounded by batboys Ed Ransom Jr. and Rod Williams, and team members: James Hawkins, Ed Ransom, Mel Brown, A. D. Hall, Irv Redmond, Roderick Barron, Calvin Allen, Edward Johnson, Charles Sterling, George Hall, Jake Stewart and Louis Hines, on playing field
